sense.def:
A connection
je odnos med dvema stvarema.

seg.quote: I do not think there is any logical connection between the two halves of the question.

sense.def:
Kadar z nekom govorimo
in connection with something
, z njim govorimo o tisti stvari.

seg.quote: The police wanted to interview him in connection with the murder.

sense.def:
A connection
je tudi stik med dvema spojenima žicama ali cevema.

To get a connection
na postaji ali letališču pomeni nadaljevati pot, tako da ujamemo drug vlak, avtobus ali letalo.
